籤詩版本二:
Wani mazugi na ciyawa yana neman maɓuɓɓugar ruwa, Abu mafi wuya a nemi aiki tuƙuru.
Wani lokaci, kwatsam na haɗu da babban abokina kuma in tafi sama hannu da hannu.
詩意:
Wannan ƙasa mazugi hexagram yana neman hoton bazara.
Komai yana da wahala kafin ya zama mai sauƙi daga baya.
解曰: Sha'awa da tunani. Yamma yana samuwa. Gara kada a motsa. Akwai wurin da za a same shi.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Chen ya gana da marar mutuwa
A daular Han ta Gabas, Liu Chen da Ruan Zhaoguo sun shiga tsaunuka don tattara ganye kuma sun hadu da wasu aljana biyu.
Su biyun suka yi aure da aljana, bayan rabin shekara suka dawo gida, ba su san shekara dari suka koma gida ba.
Ba wanda ya gane su, don haka suka koma dutse don neman aljana, amma ba su same ta ba.
聖意: Ku yi addu'a don albarka a gidanku da gidanku, don amfanin kanku, don samun kuɗi, don yin ciniki, don aure, don zaman lafiya da wadata a Liujia, ga mutanen Chitian, dasa tsutsotsin siliki da wuri, ga asarar dabbobi, ga samun mutane. , don shari'ar jama'a, ga ƙaura, ga asarar dukiya, ga cututtuka, don sa'a a cikin kaburburan dutsen Xingxing,
古人: Liu Chen ya gana da marar mutuwa
